casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dan Horace MATHURIN. No. 135P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of March 2007 by Defendant for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
